archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Collection book of banking firm in Luray (Page County), Virginia during the late 19th century.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Kagey, Rosenberger & Co. Ledger must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Kagey, Rosenberger & Co. Ledger, Ms1988-051, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Kagey, Rosenberger & Co. Ledger was purchased by Special Collections in 1988.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing and description of the Kagey, Rosenberger & Co. Ledger commenced and was completed in September, 2011.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The spine title on the ledger notes that Kagey, Rosenberger & Co. operated in Luray, Virginia. A search of available resources failed to find any additional information on either the company or its principals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single collection book maintained by Kagey, Rosenberger & Co., a banking business operating in Luray (Page County), Virginia during the late 19th century. Designated "Collection Book No. 2," the volume contains the names of debtors, amounts paid, and dates.
